SKT_FIRST.name: Rose Slash
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies with Heavy Strike.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>\nand deals more damage to bosses.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 강격으로 공격합니다.\n자신의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가하고\n보스에게는 더 큰 피해를 입힙니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵2体に強撃でダメージを与える。\n自分の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPし、\nボスにはより大きなダメージを与える。

SKT_SECOND.name: Tidal Wave
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike and recovers Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health </color>. Damage additionally increases inversely proportional to the number of targets\nand deals more damage to bosses.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 강격으로 공격하고 자신의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 회복합니다.\n자신의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다. 대상의 수가 적을수록 피해가 추가로 증가하고\n보스에게는 더 큰 피해를 입힙니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体に強撃でダメージを与え、自分のHPを<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>回復する。\n自分の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。対象の数が少ないほどダメージがUPし、\nボスにはより大きなダメージを与える。

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\n-2 <color=#FFBF00>End of the World</color> Cooldown\n+2 Weakness Gauge damage
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n<color=#FFBF00>엔드 오브 월드</color>의 쿨타임 -2\nWG 피해 +2
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n<color=#FFBF00>エンド・オブ・ワールド</color>のスキルターン減少-2\nWGダメージ+2

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: End of the World
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: エンド・オブ・ワールド
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Reduces <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> (Ignores Resilience) before attacking all enemies with Heavy Strike.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and additionally increases inversely proportional to the number of targets.\nDeals more damage to bosses and gains an <color=#28d9ed>extra turn</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 스킬 사용 전 대상 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시키고(효과 저항 무시) 적 전체를 강격으로 공격합니다.\n자신의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가하며 대상이 적을수록 피해가 추가로 증가합니다.\n보스에게는 더 큰 피해를 입히고 자신은 <color=#28d9ed>추가 턴</color>을 얻습니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: スキル発動前に対象全体の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせ(効果抵抗無視)、敵全体に強撃でダメージを与える。\n自分の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPし、対象が少ないほどダメージが追加でUPする。\nボスにはより大きなダメージを与え、自分には<color=#28d9ed>追加ターン</color>を獲得する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases Skill Chain damage of all allies. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 아군 전체의 스킬 체인 피해량이 증가합니다. 해당 공격은 <color=#28d9ed>강격</color>으로 적용됩니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>이 높을수록 피해량이 증가합니다. 해당 공격은 <color=#28d9ed>강격</color>으로 적용됩니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:味方全体のチェーンスキルのダメージがUPする。このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>強撃</color>の攻撃判定になる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:自分の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>強撃</color>の攻撃判定になる。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
